text: Ezɨ Solɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨam baraghizɨ darasi, me dɨgavir kuram gamighava azai, “Kar ti gumazir kamnaghra, a Jerusalemɨn ikia Iesusɨn ziar kamɨn deir gumazamiziba, men suigha me gasɨghasɨsi? Egh a ti me inigh mangɨ kalabusɨn gumazibar mɨn me ikɨrarɨgh ofa gamir gumazibar dapanibar dafarim darɨghasa, egha a kagh ize?”
